casebody.data:
177 A.3d 115 IN RE PETITION FOR AUTHORIZATION TO CONDUCT A REFERENDUM ON THE WITHDRAWAL OF THE BOROUGH OF WOODCLIFF LAKE FROM THE PASCACK VALLEY REGIONAL SCHOOL DISTRICT. (TOWNSHIP OF RIVER VALE-PETITIONER)

C-393 September Term 2017

079924 December 8, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004084-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
